title: Cloud Terrace Contemplation: Immortal Tea Ceremony
prompt: (masterpiece, best quality, highly detailed, stunning visual art:1.3), a serene and elegant young Xianxia maiden performing a traditional tea ceremony. The platform includes a traditional Chinese bamboo gazebo structure and overlooks an expansive, ethereal landscape of floating mountains, dramatic waterfalls, and ancient layered palaces shrouded in mist and clouds.
